page.title: 06HILL FARM-LITTLE CROSBY
page.content: Mr Wright is a local farmer. He has lived in his farmhouse{(built in 1855) with his wife and 3 children for 10 years. This farmer normally starts the day at{7.45 a.m.}unless it is{harvest {time,}when he gets up much earlier. Mr Wright and his brother are {partners.}Together they run the{200 {acre farm.}No other men are employed except as{casual labourers}for{'Spud {picking'.}This is an{arable farm } growing wheat, hay, barley, potatoes and peas. Mr Wright{sprays}his{crops to control weeds and pests e.g. greenfly, eelworm and white fly. {Special machinery}e.g. tractors, trailers, carts, ploughs, combine harvesters, discs, grass mower, muck spreader, harrow and balers are{stored in{large sheds}on the farm.
